page.title: 07EASTRIGGS PUBLIC TRANSPORT
page.content: ROAD Western SMT buses (Dumfries, Annan, Carlisle) run hourly, both directions, 0700_2300. Eastriggs minibus firm (4 vehicles) runs contract services (country children to school; women to Annan factory, etc) and charter (to functions, etc). Taxis available from Annan. RAILWAY British Rail. Carlisle, Annan, Dumfries, Glasgow route through our block but Eastriggs station closed in 1960's. Nearest station in Annan. AIR Nearest airport, Carlisle. Various companies have run services to London, then withdrawn. Other airports Prestwick, Glasgow, Edinburgh, Newcastle. SEA Nearest harbour Annan, receiving occasional small cargo_vessels. Nearest passenger ferries, Stranraer & Cairnryan (for Larne, N.I.) & Heysham (for Isle of Man and Belfast).
